mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (UserID, Password, Name, Zipcode, Address1, Address2, Email, Number, Gender, JoinDate) VALUES (#{userID}, #{password}, #{name}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, CONCAT(#{emailID}, '@', #{emailDomain}), #{number}, #{gender}, #{joinDate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE UserID = #{userID}
